remarks: Change bound variables in an indexed intersection.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 26-Aug-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Oct-2016.)
statement:
cbviun.1 $e |- F/_ y B $.
cbviun.2 $e |- F/_ x C $.
cbviun.3 $e |- ( x = y -> B = C ) $.
cbviin $p |- |^|_ x e. A B = |^|_ y e. A C $.
$d A x $.
$d A y $.
